_____ live in forests that stay dark even during the day. They scatter flickering spores that put enemies to sleep.
Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on _____’s head. The caps regrow overnight.
It likes damp dark places. When night falls, the spores filling the caps of its mushrooms glow.
It scatters its shining spores around itself. Even though they’re dangerous, nighttime tours of forests where _____ live are popular.
As it drowses the day away, it nourishes itself by sucking from tree roots. It wakens at the fall of night, wandering off in search of a new tree.
It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.
